scripts.copyStaticFiles: copy settings.json dist && copy hp.cfg.override dist && xcopy /s /i /y "./Data.Deploy/Scripts" "dist/dbScripts/"
scripts.copyStaticFilesLinux: cp settings.json dist && cp hp.cfg.override dist && cp -r "./Data.Deploy/Scripts" "dist/dbScripts/"
scripts.stopContainer: docker rm -f roadrush-build-container && docker image prune -f && docker container prune -f
scripts.start: npm run build && set HP_INSTANCE_IMAGE=evernode/sashimono:hp.0.6.4-ubt.20.04-njs.20 && hpdevkit deploy dist
scripts.start1: npm run build1 && export HP_INSTANCE_IMAGE=evernode/sashimono:hp.0.6.4-ubt.20.04-njs.20 && hpdevkit deploy dist
scripts.build1: npm run removeDistLinux && npx ncc build ./startup.js -o dist && npm run copyStaticFilesLinux
scripts.build: npm run removeDist && npm run dockerBuild && npm run dockerRun && npm run fetchDist && npm run copyStaticFiles && npm run stopContainer
